column1: in memory of james lamb sr. -- walker funeral home| first: last: born: may 25
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:walker funeral homehyden
column6: 2015 send card. james clifton lamb sr. age 82 of berea
column9: 2015 at the va hospital in lexington. born may 25
column10: 1933 in rockcastle county to the late william riley and stella mae (isaacs) lamb. he was a devoted soldier in the us military. he was a lifelong member of chairman of the board of trustees of the crestview holy sanctuary church in berea. he was a retiree of parker seal
column11: where he achieved perfect attendance for 36 years. he is survived by his loving and devoted wife of 48 years shirley lamb of berea
column12: their children kathy (jim) mc. guire of berea
column14: rod (sheila) ledford of london; one sister alice belle saylor of berea; 6 grandchildren
column15: 8 great grandchildren and a host of family and friends. in addition to his parents he was also preceded in death by two sisters wanda faye lamb stephens
column16: mary lamb sizemore and one brother charles lamb. funeral services will be 3pm saturday at crestview holy sanctuary with bro. rod ledford
column17: bro. harold eads and bro. virgil gibson officiating. burial will follow in the lamb cemetery in conway. visitation will be friday evening after 5pm at crestview holy sanctuary. pallbearers will be shawn mc. guire
column23: bill saylor and bill pence. honorary bearers will be riley ledford
column26: tevis newell and paul saylor. arrangements are being handled by lakes funeral home
column30: 5:00pmlocation: crestview holy sanctuary. addresscrestview drive. berea
